name: Michael
quote: The worst thing about prison was the dementors.

name: Dwight
quote: How would I describe myself? Three words: hardworking, alpha male, jackhammer, merciless, insatiable.

name: Jim
quote: I am about to do something very bold in this job that I've never done before... try.

name: Andy
quote: There are two things I am passionate about: recycling and revenge.

name: Pam
quote: I don't care what they say about me. I just want to eat. Which I realize is a lot to ask for... At a dinner party.

name: Angela
quote: If you pray enough you can change yourself into a cat person.

name: Darryl
quote: Yeah I wanted the manager job, but I got something much better...this soda. This is mine.

name: Toby
quote: Hazing is a fun way to show a new employee that she is not welcome or liked.

name: Jan
quote: And where it asks you to state your business he wrote, "Beeswax, Not Yours, Inc."

name: Kevin
quote: I want to be wined and dined and sixty-nined.
